articles.description: SQUARE ENIX news round-up today features the latest on Final Fantasy 7 Remake update 1.1, the Nier Replicant remaster and a nice treat for Kingdom Hearts fans.
articles.content:
The news was revealed in the latest issue of iconic Japanese gaming magazine Famitsu, with a tonne of new details about the PS4, Xbox One and Steam title emerging.
Nier fans have been teased that the new version of Replicant is "much more" than a remaster.

articles.author: Catalin Cimpanu
articles.title: UK NCSC to stop using 'whitelist' and 'blacklist' due to racial stereotyping - ZDNet
articles.description: UK cyber-security agency to use "allow list" and "deny list" on its website, going forward.
articles.content:
The UK government's cyber-security agency said this week it would stop using "whitelist" and "blacklist" due to stigma and racial stereotyping surrounding the two terms.
Instead, the UK National Cyber Security Centre said that going forward, it would use the… [+1270 chars]

articles.title: Free Xbox One Games With Gold For May 2020 Available Now - GameSpot
articles.description: Microsoft has revealed the four Xbox One games subscribers will be able to claim in May through Games With Gold, and it's another month of racing and sports games. You can grab the first two right now.
articles.content: With April winding down, it's almost time for a new batch of freebies for Xbox Live Gold and Game Pass Ultimate subscribers. Microsoft has revealed the four games--two Xbox One, two Xbox 360--you'll be able to snag in May 2020. Next month's Games with Gold of… [+1710 chars]

articles.description: Tucked away in Streets of Rage 4 are some throwbacks to classic stages and bosses; here's how to find al Streets of Rage 4 retro stages.
articles.content: Streets of Rage 4 is a fantastic throwback to the classic era of side-scrolling brawlers. While this revisit to one of the Sega Genesis' most iconic franchises introduces a brand new look and revamped gameplay, its roots are firmly planted in the retro-era, m… [+6274 chars]

articles.description: Animal Crossing includes a lot of real scientific detail in its museum pieces, but dinosaurs can be tricky.
